name: YWTencentOpenAPI-Swift
description: YWTencentOpenAPI-Swift version, Based on TencentOpenAPI version V3.5.1
prepare_command:
rm -rf Vendor/QQ/Framework/TencentOpenAPI.framework/Modules
mkdir Vendor/QQ/Framework/TencentOpenAPI.framework/Modules
touch Vendor/QQ/Framework/TencentOpenAPI.framework/Modules/module.modulemap
cat <<-EOF > Vendor/QQ/Framework/TencentOpenAPI.framework/Modules/module.modulemap
framework module TencentOpenAPI {
    header "QQApiInterface.h"
    header "QQApiInterfaceObject.h"
    header "TencentOAuth.h"
    header "sdkdef.h"

    export *
}
EOF
